name: Stench Kow

trait.name: Charge
text: If the kow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

trait.name: Stench
text: Any creature other than a stench kow that starts its turn within 5 feet of the stench kow must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all stench kows for 1 hour.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

description:
These orange and green misshapen bison are native to the Lower Planes.
Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 208
